summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3931 for the improvement of Cascadia Avenue, from Charlestown Street to Andover Street; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 47835, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
